(from t.p.) An affectionate discourse upon ... Dives and Lazarus -- The penitent prodigal on his knees -- His farewell sermon -- Closet employment -- A looking-glass for our English ladies -- A friendly dialogue between a moderate Conformist and one of his parishioners -- Remarks upon the bloody persecution of the Duke de Guise -- The arraignment, tryal and execution of our Saviour Christ, with his last words upon the cross.
